title: Additional provision for the salary revision of the Sri Lanka Police in accordance with the budget proposals of 2016
decision_details: - In accordance with the budget proposals of 2016, it has been identified that it is appropriate to pay a special allowance of 40% for Police Officers under 2 Phases, with a view to addressing the salary anomaly of the Sri Lanka Police Service. Accordingly, a provision of Rs.3000 million and Rs.6000 million have been allocated,  for the years 2016 and 2017, respectively. The proposal made by Hon. Sagala Ratnayake, the Minister of Law & Order and Southern Development, to obtain the additional provision of Rs.1,042 million required, to grant the proposed 40% payment, was approved by the Cabinet.
